name: Feed Me (ScaryPossum)
description:
The game is a short horror game made with RPG-Maker MZ.

The gameplay can reach up to 15 min. (If you choose to play only one ending.)

All visual assets that are used in this game are self-made.

Most sounds used are part of the RPGMaker sound library.

Music and a few sound effects were made with GarageBand.

Creator

ScaryPossum

Note

I hope you will enjoy my game and have fun finding all endings.

Edit

Because there were some problems with the download version, you can play it right here.
